name: java-web-app
description: An example component using Java/Tomcat template

componentTemplate.name: java-tomcat
componentTemplate.description: Java Web Application Deployment to Apache Tomcat

envPropDefs.name: tomcat.host
envPropDefs.label: Tomcat Hostname
envPropDefs.description: Tomcat Server Hostname of IP Address

envPropDefs.name: tomcat.launcher.options
envPropDefs.label: Tomcat Launcher Options
envPropDefs.description: New line separated list of options to pass to the Tomcat Launcher

envPropDefs.name: tomcat.webapps.dir
envPropDefs.label: Tomcat "webapps" Directory
envPropDefs.description: The pull path to the Tomcat Webapps directory

envPropDefs.name: tomcat.logs.dir
envPropDefs.label: Tomcat "logs" directory
envPropDefs.description: The full path to the Tomcat logs directory

envPropDefs.name: tomcat.launcher.start
envPropDefs.label: Tomcat Launcher Start
envPropDefs.description: The full path to the executable that starts Tomcat

envPropDefs.name: tomcat.launcher.stop
envPropDefs.label: Tomcat Launcher Stop
envPropDefs.description: The full path to the executable that stops Tomcat

envPropDefs.name: tomcat.launcher.start.options
envPropDefs.label: Tomcat Launcher Start Options
envPropDefs.description: New line separated list of options to pass to the Tomcat Launcher Start

envPropDefs.name: tomcat.launcher.stop.options
envPropDefs.label: Tomcat Launcher Stop Options
envPropDefs.description: New line separated list of options to pass to the Tomcat Launcher Stop

envPropDefs.name: tomcat.timeout
envPropDefs.label: Tomcat Timeout
envPropDefs.description: Timeout in seconds for checking various Tomcat operations, e.g. started, stopped, is running etc.

processes.name: jetty-copy
processes.description: Quick process to download artifacts only

processes.name: jetty-deploy
processes.description: Deploy the web application (war) into Jetty directory

processes.name: jetty-restart-service
processes.description: Restart the Jetty Service for the current environment

processes.name: octane-add-comments
processes.description: Update Octane work items with comment on details of deployment

properties.commentBody: ${p:request.user.displayName} successfully deployed component "${p:component.name}" version "${p:version.name}" to environment "${p:environment.name}". See request: ${p:server.url}/#componentProcessRequest/${p:request.id}

processes.name: octane-create-defect
processes.description: Create a new defect in Octane

processes.name: tomcat-clean
processes.description: Stop Tomcat and remove logs, temporary files etc.

processes.name: tomcat-copy
processes.description: Downloads and copies files into the Tomcat "webapps" directory for "hot-deployment"

processes.name: tomcat-deploy
processes.description: Download files and deploys to Tomcat using the "manager" API.

processes.name: tomcat-restart
processes.description: Restart Tomcat for the current environment

processes.name: tomcat-start
processes.description: Start Tomcat for the current environment if it is not running

processes.name: tomcat-stop
processes.description: Start Tomcat for the current environment if it is not running

envPropDefs.name: messages.home
envPropDefs.label: Home Message
envPropDefs.description: An example message to be injected into the home page

configTemplates.name: application.yml
configTemplates.data:
server:
  port: 9080

messages:
  home: @messages.home@

spring:
  thymeleaf:
    cache: false
    check-template: true
    check-template-location: true
    content-type: text/html
    enabled: true
    encoding: UTF-8
    # excluded-view-names:
    # mode: HTML5
    # prefix: /templates/
    # suffix: .html
    # template-resolver-order:
    # view-names:

example:
  db:
    host: @example.db.host@
    port: @example.db.port@
    name: @example.db.name@
    username: @example.db.username@
    password: @example.db.password@
